description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: As of: October 19th, 2025
Seen: 55%.
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
* Barbie is #1 with 6,05M views
* The Fast and the Furious is #500 with 1,196M views
Monthly changes:

* Weapons (#297), KPop Demon Hunters (#442), F1 (#467), The Conjuring 2 (#490) and Heretic (#495) are new on this list. Snowpiercer, The Holiday, Solo: A Star Wars Story, The Irishman and The Favourite are out
* Since there hasn't been a full update in three months, there will a fresh update of the movies with the most spots gained and lost in November :)
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1,195M views)
* Society of the Snow (1,193M views)
* Heat (1,193M views)
* Enola Holmes (1,192M views)
* Snowpiercer (1,190M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* Grown Ups (1,173M views)
* Scary Movie (1,146M views)
* One Battle After Another (1,070M views)
